summary: O.C. and Stiggs aren't your average unhappy teenagers. They not only despise their suburban surroundings, they plot against it. They seek revenge against the middle class Schwab family, who embody all they detest: middle class.
cast: Daniel Jenkins|Neill Barry|Jane Curtin|Paul Dooley|Jon Cryer|Laura Lanoil|Victor Ho|Ray Walston|Donald May|Carla Borelli|Stephanie Elfrink|Amanda Hull|James Gilsenan|Tina Louise|Cynthia Nixon|Greg Wrangler|Dennis Hopper|Alan Autry|Louis Nye|Dan Ziskie|Martin Mull|Melvin Van Peebles|Tiffany Helm|Dana Andersen|Bob Uecker|Margery Bond|Jeannine Ann Cole|Nina van Pallandt|Thomas Hal Phillips|Danny Darst|Caroline Aaron|Tom Flagg|Maurice Orozco|Louis Enriques|Frank Sprague|Robert Fortier|Allan Berne|Roger Carter|Roy Gunsberg|Robert Ledford|Lobo|Bob Reilly|Richard Thompson|Wayne Wallace|D.C. Warren|Florence White|Fred Newman|King Sunny Ade|Gary Guthrie|Cyndee Head
keywords: character names as title|teensploitation|revenge|suburban life|girl wears eyeglasses
title: ¿Quién dice locos?
